Button.Name: CheckLocation
Button.OnPress:
gHeight=Parent.Parent.Height gWidth=Parent.Parent.Width
iTop=Parent.Top iBottom=(iTop + Parent.Height) iLeft=Parent.Left iRight=(iLeft + Parent.Width)
iNewTop=(gHeight - Parent.Height) iNewTop=(iNewTop / 2) iNewTop=int(iNewTop) iNewTopPos=(iNewTop > 0) iNewTop=(iNewTopPos ? iNewTop : 1)
bCheckTop=(iTop < 0) bCheckBottom=(iBottom > gHeight) bCheckVertical=(bCheckTop || bCheckBottom) Parent.Top=(bCheckVertical ? iNewTop : iTop)
iNewLeft=(gWidth - Parent.Width) iNewLeft=(iNewLeft / 2) iNewLeft=int(iNewLeft) iNewLeftPos=(iNewLeft > 0) iNewLeft=(iNewLeftPos ? iNewLeft : 1)
bCheckLeft=(iLeft < 0) bCheckRight=(iRight > gWidth) bCheckHorizontal=(bCheckLeft || bCheckRight) Parent.Left=(bCheckHorizontal ? iNewLeft : iLeft)

Button.Name: SetupAllCmd
Button.OnPress:
sCMD=('Parent.LorePage.Name.text')
Parent.DoCommand.onpress=(code1Start ## sCMD ## code1End) Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=(code2Start ## sCMD ## code2End) Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.SetupCmd.press=true Parent.NotesPage.Note.text=(Parent.SetupCmd.sCOND)

Page.Name: NotesPage
Page.Text: :43a26ad55ecad634:Rune-Encrusted Ivy Etched Underwear of the GODS

Button.Name: Edit
Button.OnPress:
Parent.Note.Visible=false Parent.NoNote.visible=false Parent.Input.Visible=true
bCheck=(Parent.Note.Text == ' ') Parent.Input.Text=(bCheck ? '' : Parent.Note.Text)
Parent.Cancel.enabled=true Parent.Save.enabled=true
sXML=(drumsui_itemnotes.xml) map2_custom_poi_filename sXML map2_custom_poi_filename sXML map2_custom_poi_filename=drumsui_itemnotes.xml map2_custom_poi_filename=drumsui_itemnotes.xml
set_focus Parent.Input

Button.Name: Save
Button.OnPress:
sTemp=Parent.ItemName.text xTemp='Parent.ItemName.text'
Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Popup.AddPoi.PoiNameTextbox.text=(Parent.ItemName.text) Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Popup.AddPoi.PoiDesc.text=(Parent.Input.text)
Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Popup.AddPoi.OnShow="ButtonOK.visible=false"
Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Popup.AddPoi.ButtonOK.OnHide="show_window Popup.AddPoi.ButtonOK" Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Popup.AddPoi.ButtonOK.OnShow="Parent.ButtonOK.press=true" Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Popup.AddPoi.ButtonOK.visible=false Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Popup.AddPoi.ButtonOK.OnPress=codeToCopy
Parent.SaveText.press=true
yTemp=(varPipe)##(xTemp)##(varPipe)##(' ItemNotes') map2_delete_poi yTemp
map2_add_poi ItemNotes 0 0 0
Parent.Note.Visible=true Parent.Input.Visible=false Parent.Parent.Initialize.press=true
Parent.Cancel.enabled=false Enabled=false

Button.Name: SaveText
Button.OnPress:
sCMD=('Parent.ItemName.text')
Parent.DoCommand.onpress=(code1Start ## sCMD ## code1End) Parent.DoCommand.visible=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=(code2Start ## sCMD ## code2End) Parent.DoCommand.visible=true
Parent.DoCommand.onpress=(code3Start ## sCMD ## code3End) Parent.DoCommand.visible=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=(code4Start ## sCMD ## code4End) Parent.DoCommand.visible=true

Text.Name: Info
Text.Tooltip:
Item Notes input accepts multiple lines.
Quotes and apostrophes are safe.
Recommended to stick to normal text characters.
